alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Racine and Kenosha Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 929 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paddock Lake, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Racine, Mount Pleasant, Pleasant Prairie, Sturtevant, Union Grove, Paddock Lake, Camp Lake, Winthrop Harbor, Rochester, Yorkville, Silver Lake, Wind Point, Eagle Lake, Browns Lake, Waterford North, Caledonia, Salem, Waterford, and Bristol. This includes Interstate 41/94 between mile markers 329 and 349. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
